mapper.select: select '当日新增用户数' as name,count(1) as value from cfdb_users where date_format(createDate,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{currentTime}
select '当日做任务总人数' as name,count(1) as value from (select distinct deviceid from cfdb_adv_his where date_format(createDate,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{currentTime}) as a
select '当日完成任务总数' as name,count(1) as value from (select distinct adid,deviceid from cfdb_adv_his where date_format(createDate,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{currentTime}) as a

select '当日用户总收入' as name, ifnull((select sum(income) from cfdb_income_his where date_format(incomeTime,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{currentTime} and flag=1),0) - ifnull((select sum(income) from cfdb_income_his where date_format(incomeTime,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{currentTime} and flag=2),0) as value

select '当日公司总收入' as name, ifnull((select sum(sysincome) from cfdb_income_his where date_format(incomeTime,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{currentTime} and flag=1),0) - ifnull((select sum(sysincome) from cfdb_income_his where date_format(incomeTime,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{currentTime} and flag=2),0) as value
